## IGridLayout.spansForSize() method

Calculates the required number of columns &amp; rows for the given size.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
spansForSize(size: ReadonlyVec): [number, number];
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  size | <code>ReadonlyVec</code> |  |
